ChatApp.error_create_room: Only member can create a room
ChatApp.error_ban_with_reason: You banned from {{roomName}} by {{adminName}} ({{ userRole }}) reason: {{reason}}.
ChatApp.error_admin_ban_all_room: You banned in all rooms by admin
ChatApp.system_user_request_video_permission: {{username}} requests permission to view your broadcast in {{roomName}}.
ChatApp.user_broadcast_permission: {{username}} requests permission to view your broadcast.
ChatApp.pending_permission_request: Requesting permission to {{username}}. Please wait for a moment
ChatApp.kicked_from_owner: You kicked in the {{roomName}} by owner
ChatApp.banned_from_owner: You banned from the {{roomName}} by owner
ChatApp.banned_from_admin: You banned in the {{roomName}} by admin
ChatApp.sys_closed_private_message: This user logged out, message delivery failed. Close this room.
ChatApp.sys_ban_admin_room_all: {{username}} has banned in all rooms by admin
ChatApp.error_admin_can_ban_user: Only admin can ban a user
ChatApp.error_message_time_interval: You can send message one by {{count}} miliseconds
ChatApp.socket_disconnected: Your socket is disconnected, Reconnect again.
ChatApp.connection_lost_description: The connection to the chat was interrupted. Attempting to reconnect...
ChatApp.already_in_chat: The same user is already chatting.
ChatApp.private_logout_error: This user logged out, message delivery failed. Please close this chat.
ChatApp.info_banned: Only registered user can log from this  device
ChatApp.banned_from_room: you are banned from this room

AddRoomModal.error1: You are already in this room
AddRoomModal.error2: You can't join into this room. You banned by owner
AddRoomModal.error3: You can't join into this room. over users

CreateRoom.room_name_descr: Please keep in mind that your room name is permanent and offensive words are restricted.
CreateRoom.category_descr: Help people understand what your room is about by choosing the most appropriate category.
CreateRoom.description_descr: This brief summary of your room will appear under your room name on your room page and other areas of the site. The limit is 80 characters.
CreateRoom.welcome_message_descr: This is a welcome message shown to users when they enter your chat room. The limit is 700 characters.
CreateRoom.max_users_descr: Help people understand what your room is about by choosing the most appropriate category.
CreateRoom.password_descr: Password protect your room. People can only join your room in they know the password.
CreateRoom.icon_descr: This icon will display on your chat room page and chat sidebar. 160x160 is the recommended size for this image.
CreateRoom.cover_descr: This image will show up at the top of your chat room page. 800x200 is the recommended size for this image.

LoginPage.session_expired: Your session expired, Please login again.
LoginPage.confirm_error: This user is blocked on server
LoginPage.username_error: This user is not on server
LoginPage.unknown_error: Login failed, please try again later

UserActionArea.sent_broadcast_request: Your request to view was sent to {{owner}}, Please wait for response
UserActionArea.error_not_broadcast_video: This user didn't create broadcast video
UserActionArea.error_already_broadcasting: You are already broadcasting in {{roomName}}. Please stop broadcast there and start here.
UserActionArea.error_not_ready_broadcast: You are not ready to broadcast
UserActionArea.you_are_already_watching_the_broadcastin: You are already watching the broadcasting video
UserActionArea.error_guest_dont_have_permission: Guest user can't send private message

SettingModal.size_descr: Adjust the size of messages in the chat.
SettingModal.join_room_descr: Display notification messages when people join or leave a chat room.

Message.forbidden: Your message has been blocked by admin
Message.timeError: Too short time interval between messages!
Message.private_muted: This user ignored you on private chat. Your message may have been ignored.
Message.private_blocked: You are blocked on private chat.

SidebarLeft.error_not_support_this_browser: Broadcasting is not supported with this browser
